about_the_game:
Jaxx Fury, the legendary hero, returns to his hometown after years of exile. With his brave and unyielding spirit, he stands as the last hope against the dark wizard Nachtengel. As shadows loom and danger grows, Jaxx must rise to save his people and reclaim his destiny, that was once a dream, and shall be realized!

Take control of our hero, wielding his legendary guitar as a weapon to battle hordes of enemies and conquer challenging obstacles! Navigate through vibrant levels filled with dynamic environments... with hidden 1UPs for you to find.

Features:
  • Heavy Metal music to go along with the fast-pace
  • Novel levels to let players experience different ambiance
  • Challenging obstacles with varying difficulty
  • Final boss worthy of rage!

Let Nala guide you to Nachtengel and defeat him once and for all! Navigate the labyrinth of this cursed town with many different obstacles in your way.

Do not be disheartened! Do not give up, no matter how difficult it gets. The town depends on you!
... and finally, always head towards the gate!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13+ /11/12/13/14/15
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Stargazer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Graphics: 256 Video Memory (OpenGL 2.0+ support enabled)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Jaxx Fury returns to his hometown as the last hope against the dark wizard Nachtengel. With bravery and determination, he must save his people and fulfill his destiny. Guided by Nala, navigate the cursed town's labyrinth and defeat Nachtengel. The town's fate depends on you!
